item.title: FT Most Read: Friday, September 13, 2024 at 1:10 AM UTC
item.description:
1. Trumpâ€™s camp reels after debate injects new doubt into re-election bid
2. US Navy Seal unit that killed bin Laden trains for China invasion of Taiwan
3. Gary Stevenson claims to have been the best trader in the world. His old colleagues disagree
4. ECB cuts interest rates to 3.5%
5. Berkshire vice-chair Jain sells more than half his stake in company
